name: Dipsa
description: The Dipsa is a small, cunning ooze with the ability to blend into swampy environments. Its translucent body allows it to surprise unsuspecting foes, and it has a discreet bite which inflicts ongoing acid damage while attached to its target.
memorable: Its ability to attach to larger creatures and reduce their maximum hit points makes it particularly dangerous in ambush situations.
goals: The Dipsa typically seeks to ambush larger creatures and inflict damage while remaining hidden.
relations: It may be found alongside other swamp-dwelling creatures or as a solitary ambusher in murky waters.
environment: Commonly found in swamps and wetland areas.
strengths: Exceptional stealth and the ability to evade direct confrontation due to its low physical strength.
weaknesses: Very weak in physical confrontations due to a low Strength score.
attacks: Uses a discreet bite attack to deal piercing damage and attach to its target, inflicting ongoing acid damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to attach to a target, dealing ongoing damage and reducing their maximum hit points until they take a long rest.
senses: Has blindsight 60 ft., allowing it to detect creatures in its vicinity without relying on vision.
skills: Skilled in Stealth with a +5 modifier, enhancing its ability to hide.
additional_information: Can move through cracks as small as 1 inch due to its Amorphous trait.
Doesn't require sleep, allowing it to stay vigilant for long periods.
Gains advantage on Dexterity checks in swampy terrain due to Swamp Camouflage.
